org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingscaling.core.synctask

接口 SyncTask

  • 所有已知实现类:
    HistoryDataSyncTask, HistoryDataSyncTaskGroup, RealtimeDataSyncTask

    public interface SyncTask
    Sync task interface.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      SyncProgress getProgress()
      Get synchronize progress.
      void prepare()
      Prepare to start synchronize data.
      void start(ReportCallback callback)
      Start synchronize data.
      void stop()
      Stop synchronize data.

    • 方法详细资料

      • prepare

        void prepare()
        Prepare to start synchronize data.

      • start

        void start(ReportCallback callback)
        Start synchronize data.
        参数:
        callback - invoke when sync task exit.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop synchronize data.

      • getProgress

        SyncProgress getProgress()
        Get synchronize progress.
        返回:
        migrate progress
